item.title: A 2021's Guide to Developing Front-End Projects from Scratch
item.description: This article is about manually configuring a front-end project from scratch, which will involve Webpack, React, Babel, TypeScript, Ant Design, Sass, Eslint, Prettier.

item.title: In just 30 minutes, you'll thoroughly understand how the Web works
item.description: If you’re a developer just starting out on the Web, this article will help you quickly grasp how the Web works.
